name: Star Patrol Nova
storyline:
The Star Patrol was formed following the catastrophic Gravity Wars of the 32nd Century, to ensure conflict of that scale was never seen again. For 200 years civilisations were rebuilt and alliances between the world's reforged.

The game begins with the abduction of a peace emissary on passage to vital peace talks between two volatile worlds. Somebody doesn't want peace, and that could be the beginnings of something dire.

Travel to multiple worlds on missions to unravel the mystery and choose between different priorities to advance the plot in different directions.
summary: Star Patrol Nova is a sci-fi narrative driven deckbuilder inspired by science fiction anime of the late 70's and early 80's. Take control of a team of four Star Rangers as they defend the Free Star Systems from a deadly new enemy.
